parameter.name: amount
parameter.description: Payment amount made by the customer.

parameter.name: invoices
parameter.description: An Array which contain invoice payment details.

parameter.name: paymentMode
parameter.description: Mode of payment for the amount received.

parameter.name: referenceNumber
parameter.description: Reference number for the customer payment.

parameter.name: taxAccountId
parameter.description: ID of the tax account, in case of withholding tax.

parameter.name: accountId
parameter.description: ID of the cash/ bank account the payment has to be deposited.

parameter.name: contactPersons
parameter.description: IDs of contact persons the thank you mail has to be triggered.
